action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A canal with a white boat in the foreground, and many other boats docked on both sides. There are buildings on both sides of the canal, and trees lining the banks. The sky is blue with white clouds.

DESCRIPTION: A canal with a white boat in the foreground, and a line of boats on the right side of the canal. There are buildings on both sides of the canal, and trees lining the banks. The sky is blue with white clouds.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A canal with a white boat in the foreground, and many other boats docked on both sides. There are buildings on both sides of the canal, and trees lining the banks. The sky is blue with white clouds.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any boats in the middle of the canal, other than the white boat in the foreground?
